article_title: California wildfires threaten thousands of homes
article_text: September 12, 2015, 1:31 PM |At least 33 large wildfires are burning in half a dozen states across the West. In Northern California, the fast-moving "Butte fire" has grown to more than 100 square miles in two days, threatening thousands of homes. Dangerous conditions have also sparked new evacuations for another fire that has been raging for weeks. Carter Evans reports.
